attributes.action: Give the high band disabled the same Christmas bonus as pensioners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many high rated disabled people are home bound and should qualify for the same Christmas bonus as the pensioners these vunaralble people are in most cases worse off then pensioners yet don,t get the christmas bonus that pensioners get yet have the same and in most cases more need for this bonus The £10 bonus most get is a joke and this government is supposed to look after its disabled people
